data.feedback: Well-designed plan with accurate file paths, clean architecture, and smart story consolidation. All filesToModify exist, all filesToCreate are confirmed new files, and coverage is complete.

issues.description: Story 3 filesToRead includes src/utils/platform.ts but only depends on story-1. Minor inconsistency but non-blocking since patterns documented in description.

suggestions: Consider adding story-2 as dependency for story-3 for strict consistency, OR remove platform.ts from story-3's filesToRead
